findings.title: Unsecure calculation
findings.description: The calculations could cause unhandled errors such as integer under- or overflow and division by zero.

findings.title: Wrong import of OpenZeppelin library
findings.description: In the current implementation, OpenZeppelin files are added directly into the code, which violates OpenZeppelinâ€™s MIT license.

findings.title: A floating pragma is set
findings.description: The current pragma Solidity directive is ^0.5.13; It is recommended to specify a fixed version.

findings.title: Hardcoded address
findings.description: The contract contains unknown addresses that might be used for some malicious activity.

findings.title: Missing natspec documentation
findings.description: Solidity contracts can use a special form of comments to provide rich documentation for functions, return variables and more.

findings.title: Old pragma version
findings.description: Old pragma version can lead to errors.

findings.title: Unsafe Mathematical Operations
findings.description: Potential under- or overflow and division by zero errors in mathematical operations.
